website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for well-made protectors that are easy to use and maintain, you'd have a difficult time finding a set that has more to offer than this pack of 10.
pros: These PTFE gas range protectors distance themselves from similar models for being slightly thicker, which adds to their durability
cons: Could burn at very high temperatures, which is a common issue with PTFE gas range protectors

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep the drip pans clean
customer_reviews.text: I picked these up to try to keep our drip pans clean when cooking. So far they work great. No issues with the heat when cooking and clean up is really easy now. Just pull the covers and wash them in the sink. A lot easier then trying to get all the drip pans clean. It's saved us a lot of clean up time and keeps the kitchen looking clean.
customer_reviews.author: Robotica Industries

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep your stove clean
customer_reviews.text: This makes cleaning my stove so much easier. I have tried other ones before that were more expensive, these are a much better deal for 10 of them! and the material is exactly the same as the more expensive one I have tried before. Cleaning is easy like cleaning dishes. I normally clean every 2 weeks and if it gets too dirty, I replace them every 3-4 months, and I dont feel so bad replacing them more often at 8.99 for 10.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Vo

customer_reviews.title: Worth othe money & easy installed
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for this cover for my kitchen stove burner. Even Walmart has it but seems so different from the one I have now, happy with the product and the price really affordable. Came with 8 pieces, only used 4 and I have 4 to spare. Quality not bad and it’s easy to clean. Overall so happy with it. Definitely recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beny Fam

customer_reviews.title: Not worth even the cheap price
customer_reviews.text: It's not very often that I make a purchase I regret but this would certainly qualify. This stuff is paper thin so it's not heavy enough to lay flat and if you get even so much as one wrinkle (which is easy), it's practically useless. Because it has to be kept 1/2in from the flame, you can't get it right up to the burner. And cutting it so it looks nice is impossible. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: J. Oliphant

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is best product I ever use for stove! It save me dozens of times for cleaning the grease stove top. And please don’t worry about the heat resistant, they have no problem at all! So give it a try.. you will not regret. It fits any type of stove since they can be trim down to fit any shape.
customer_reviews.author: livia M

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was a different product
customer_reviews.text: You just cut them and lay them down. They don't look great and catch fire if they slide but it did make it easy for us to protect the stove if you are renting. I thought it would be fitted and maybe magnetic or something but it's just a weird plasticy paper.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my new stove. I was worried about keeping it clean. These work great!! They are easy to install and cleaning is so easy. These burner covers give me piece of mind when family cooks! :)
customer_reviews.author: DeeK

customer_reviews.title: Catches flames from the stovetop
customer_reviews.text: It took some time to customize it to fit my stove. I had to cut it around the edges and near the hole. I made sure it doesn’t touch the gas holes. Nevertheless, unless I keep the stove gas setting at the lowest, it catches the flame from the stove and expands it to weird places.
customer_reviews.author: Gfu

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t use them yet but I always stainless steel stove covers from another company and this by far is thicker and more sturdier than my previous ones
customer_reviews.author: Joella

customer_reviews.title: Small in size for my stove.
customer_reviews.text: I will give e star as they are small in size and does not cover full space of our stove. You have to scrub hard in order to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: K-bani

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Kind of a pain to cut but atleast you only need to do it once. 10 pack gives extra cuts if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great unfortunately has to gift it, because my gas stove is round not square
customer_reviews.author: Jazzie ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product. Did not fit my stove. Large gaps so liquid spills went under and made a mess. Threw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: First its not really heat resistant makes mess under stove that is hard to clean. Not easy to install if you cut to close it will burn too far then it won't serve the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Sourabh

customer_reviews.title: Win-Win
customer_reviews.text: When time to clean up, it’s easy & quick to clean the stove top, as well as the covers. This means I do clean up more often. Win-Win.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Sims

customer_reviews.title: Not the best purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what i I thought, and they burn up on my gas stove ...sad
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Kartes

customer_reviews.title: Saved my gas stove
customer_reviews.text: My gas stove can get pretty gross after frying bacon. These covers have saved me time and energy cleaning. You have to cut to your stove size but that's quite easy.
customer_reviews.author: the91162

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Because the cover was reusable I gave it a try, but unfortunately it’s not what I had expected. It doesn’t stand up to the heat. The cover was thinner than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I've had others in the past but they weren't as nice as these. These are much thicker and are more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Fults

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Thicker than most. Much better than the ones I had. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: I wish they make this with the exact shape of the stove
customer_reviews.author: Mikael

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome! When something spills, they are easy to clean. You just wipe it off!
customer_reviews.author: Amalia E. Nazario

customer_reviews.title: Not practical
customer_reviews.text: Hard to cut just right and spills get right under it
customer_reviews.author: Secret

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Now my stove top is protected. Easy to wipe for spills while cooking. Size is good too because you can cut it to what the size of your oven so it can fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda brinas

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut & install. Makes clean up easy & effortless
customer_reviews.author: M Carrington

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Look great easy to cut. But when you cook they do burn and leave white holes.
customer_reviews.author: Kenetra White

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect! Just what I needed. I love that I dont have to worry cleaning my stove after each cooking. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is useless
customer_reviews.text: This product is too flimsy. It does not stay in place. No matter how careful you are it does get damaged when it is near the flame. Totally overpriced and useless, Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Gurdev K. Mistry

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this item now my stove stays clean when there’s any splattered food I just wipe it clean it is reusable
customer_reviews.author: Kiran hunt

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I like this product so far as far as heat and protection, but they should have an simple instruction how to set up cutting it to custom fit vs just sending it in. Good product
customer_reviews.author: John Metasavage

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Thicker then other liners I've ordered before. The best there is!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Tate

customer_reviews.title: Buying more
customer_reviews.text: Love these covers they keep food from dropping into the burner.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Braden

customer_reviews.title: Easy! Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut, easy to measure, and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Much needed stove burner covers for messy husband
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean and out on stove. Needed to cut the hole bigger but it works fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Na
customer_reviews.text: Good idea the Executing was not as much. It was not standardized for most stovetops.
customer_reviews.author: Ahadd

customer_reviews.title: Maybe, maybe not
customer_reviews.text: These were not quite what I was expecting. More trimming than I thought also. They do not fit the burners as shown. I was expecting a more snug fit. They are easy to clean but food can still get under them. They do give a better appearance to an older stove top.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hildebrandt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love these they are easy to clean but they get burn when used on high setting of stove.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed ElGanainy

product_meta.title: 10 Pack Gas Stove Burner Covers, Non-Stick Stove Burner Liners,Gas Range Protectors, Stovetop Covers for Gas Burners Double Thickness 0.3mm Reusable & Dishwasher Safe(Black)
feature_bullets: ★HIGH TEMPERATURE RESIST- The gas range covers can resist temperatures up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit and is safe near the flame at least 0.5 inches distance. And it's not 100% fireproof, please keep the sheet at least 0.5 inch from the flame to avoid possible product damage.

★NON-TOXIC & ODORLESS- Made of durable nonstick glass cloth coated premium Teflon, non-toxic, no chemical smell. Can be also used safely in the dishwasher. Keep harmful chemicals away from your family.
★NON-STICK & EASY TO CLEAN- Non-stick gas range protectors to keep your stove clean at any time. And it's very convenient to clean, just take it down and wash it in hot soapy water, or in dishwasher.

★EASY ADJUST TO FIT YOUR STOVE-27x27cm/10.6x10.6inch size. Material of stovetop burner protectors are easier to cut and allow you to adjust the inner radius by cutting. Perfect for most types of gas ranges. And with reusable material, this gas range covers can be long time used.
★KEEP YOUR STOVE TOP CLEAN- This gas range covers will reduce your time of cleaning the your stove surface for removing spills or oil stains and it will look sleek and neat.
